abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews folk album Don't Weigh Down the Light by vocalist Meg Baird.
lead_paragraph: “Don’t Weigh Down the Light” is a post-folk record, with notes of the Renaissance madrigal tradition as well as an airier version of Sandy Denny.

headline.main: Review: Meg Baird, Always Generous, Gives Even More in New Album
headline.print_headline: Review: Meg Baird, Always Generous, Gives Even More in New Album

snippet: “Don’t Weigh Down the Light” is a post-folk record, with notes of the Renaissance madrigal tradition as well as an airier version of Sandy Denny.
